channel.title: CVE Feed for Fibar Group S.A -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Fibar Group S.A -- all products

item.title: CVE-2021-20990|2024-09-16T16:42:28.116Z -- fibar%20group%20s.a -- fibaro%20home%20center
item.description: In Fibaro Home Center 2 and Lite devices with firmware version 4.600 and older an internal management service is accessible on port 8000 and some API endpoints could be accessed without authentication to trigger a shutdown, a reboot or a reboot into recovery mode.

item.title: CVE-2021-20991|2024-09-16T17:42:55.068Z -- fibar%20group%20s.a -- fibaro%20home%20center
item.description: In Fibaro Home Center 2 and Lite devices with firmware version 4.540 and older an authenticated user can run commands as root user using a command injection vulnerability.
